title: PBL-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Novice professional learners facing math-requiring work scenarios (e.g., budget allocation, data analysis) as corporate managers. Blended learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments: weekly offline workshops + asynchronous learning via mobile LMS

learning_goals: Learners can identify mathematical problems occurring in real workplace contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Over 90% of learners can design authentic PBL problems incorporating peer feedback.
By the end of the course, over 85% of learners can present actionable solutions in teams using problems they developed.
Achieve a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the learning satisfaction survey

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
